location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Mechanical Transport Chart. Passable normally to M.T. (i.e. up to 3 Ton Trucks in winter and 5 Ton Trucks in summer’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 302 x 127 mm, on sheet 390 x 205 mm.Materials: Printed on paper.

mods.abstract: The map, which bears an additional title: ‘Condition of the Duzdap-Meshed Road February 1930’, indicates the road between Duzdap [Zahedan] and Meshed [Mashad] and its suitability for motor transport (‘M.T.’) The key indicates the condition of the roads on the route: good; normally good, requiring repairs; fair; bad; and very bad condition. Key towns and villages on the road are also marked. Marked in the bottom left corner of the map is the statement: ‘D[rawing].O[ffice].S[imla].I. No. E 6101 8-30.’

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
